subject: Issue with brake load cell
description_text:
I have a issue with de brake load cell when calibrating, is there a way to got a new load cell for the brake only?

See the video for the issue when calibrating




Thanks you for your reply




Envoyé de mon iPhone

conversations.body_text: Hi Samuel Morin,    Please first check the version number shown at the bottom left of the software. If it is 1.7.1, we recommend updating to the latest version SIMSONN Manager 2.1.2. Please follow the steps below to perform the update.   After connecting the device, if you see a message saying “Version too old, not supported” or Simsonn Flasher mode, go to Settings → Update → Manual Firmware Update → pedals-firmware-plus.sfu to update the firmware. Once the update is complete, make sure to recalibrate the pedals, as they will not function properly in games without calibration.           https://www.simsonn.com/pages/download

Hi,     I have install de lastest version of your software, Simsonn Manager 2.1.2 .     I still got the same probleme, the loadcell is not accurate on high value. As i press harder the value got down, when i release the pedal the value go up before going down. It seem to be a probleme with the load cell…     I got the Simsonn Plus V1.8.0     I already unplug and clean all the usb and rj12 connector with dust cleaner, nothing change…     All the wire are in good condition…     I have put a video to show you what happening
Hi Samuel Morin,     Please provide your order number and purchase date, so we can check your order details and offer you an appropriate solution.
